meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this contemporary vanity set. Made of solid wood, it includes a spacious cabinet and 5 soft-close drawers. Sink and vanity top included. 36"W x 34.25"H x 21"D. 3 faucet holes, 1.5" faucet hole size. Rear drain placement. Granite, marble, or quartz vanity top. 5-year commercial warranty. Assembly required. China and Vietnam origin."
meta_title: "Quen 36" Freestanding Vanity Set | Cabinet, Top, Oval Sink & 8" Faucet Holes"
